desc: Students continue to develop the listening, speaking, reading and writing skills that will enable them to deal not only with topics of daily life, but also cultural themes and authentic materials. Class meets four times week. Prerequisite: Japanese 231 or its equivalent. GE: FOL-J.
name: Intermed Japanese II
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Japanese 231 or its equivalent. GE: FOL-J.
title: Intermediate Japenese II
